short_summary: Bid Request for SSC GPSCC3 - FS3C DDN Expansion with amendments
description: Request for Bid: Quick fixed location Installation tenders for the expansion of FS3C
full_summary:
================================
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Summary

**GPSCC3 - FS3C DDN Expansion**
**Reference Number:** SSC-24-00025389:T
**Publication Date:** January 30, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** February 19, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST

**Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada

This closed tender invitation announces the solicitation of proposals for the supply of goods related to the maintenance of ADP Input-Output and Storage Devices. The goods will be used to support the Shared Services Canada GGCC3 project.

### Key Details

* **Contract Category:** Supply Arrangements
* **Procurement Method:** Competitively open bid
* **Trade Agreements:** World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)
* **End User:** Shared Services Canada

### Additional Information

Proposals should be submitted electronically, and additional information may be obtained from the Shared Services Canada website. Contact Eleanor, Cesare at 613-219-8366 for more details.

### Documents

The following documents are available for download:

* [Goods and Services Code Manual](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/2664F89C-2E2C-4B84-9936-147EAD514C2C)
* [Request for Proposal](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/130BD4A2-0F48-4B54-909A-93581A281499)
* [GWCC AmE Site Specific Service Level Agreement](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/6FB1943F-3CCB-4037-B203-C8046F261D8E)

The originals of this tender can be obtained from the Government of Canada's Contract Regulations website. We can be reached at 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa ON, K0A 0C3.

### Applications and Submissions

Responses to this tender should be submitted online. Shared Services Canada recommends registering on the Supplier Registration Portal to receive up-to-date information and notifications about this tender. The Contractor can
